textContent:
Make every little thing an achievemnt of different points. At the end of the beta, everything is wiped, but based on your achievement points you gain extra things, like cosmetics, mounts, etc.

This creates an incentive for players to both try to do most things possible (to check for bugs or suggestions) and for them to return afterwards.


Implement a UI addon that allows you to report bugs for any spell, quest or item from a Ctrl+Alt+Click on the button or summary.
